name: The Adventure of Willy the Woodworker
name_original: The Adventure of Willy the Woodworker
description:
Willy's Workshop has been taken over by Goblins, and he must escape!

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the arrow keys to move.

Use the space bar to jump

Use the ctrl key for your mallet.  Your mallet can defeat Goblins and can also block their projectiles.

Made for the Dogpit Jam 2018.
